name: Movement (Tiepolo 2)
description: A video piece based on Giovanni Battista Tiepolo's (1696-1770) "Neptune offering Venice the gifts of the sea". The process of copying, key part in the tradition of learning in the painter's workshop,is the basis for the creation of a piece of movement, exploring kinetic features formally to create a new piece, a video moment, a video image, interrogating the image beyond  representation, hiding and showing, creating a rythm, displaying,standing on the perpetual loop of the contained light. Movement is the focus, the topic, the subject. A-B=C. file type:mp4/mkv author:gefercan  year of creation:2021-2022. length: 30 second (aprox.) size: 1280 x 1280 pixels
